subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Robin Haase of the Netherlands defeated Albert Montanes of Spain, 6-4, 4-6, 6-1, to win his first career ATP title at the Bet-at-Home Cup in Kitzbühel, Austria.
snippet: Robin Haase of the Netherlands defeated Albert Montanes of Spain, 6-4, 4-6, 6-1, to win his first career ATP title at the Bet-at-Home Cup in Kitzbühel, Austria.
